Package grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler

Class AbstractAnnouncementHandler

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.AbstractAnnouncementHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GTNetMessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BusyAnnouncementHandler, DataRevokeHandler, MaintenanceAnnouncementHandler, OfflineAnnouncementHandler, OnlineAnnouncementHandler, OperationDiscontinuedHandler, ReleasedBusyAnnouncementHandler, ServerlistRevokeHandler, SettingsUpdatedAnnouncementHandler
public abstract class AbstractAnnouncementHandler extends AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
Abstract base class for handlers that process announcement messages. Announcement messages are one-way notifications that do not expect a response. Examples include:
  • Maintenance window announcements
  • Service discontinuation notices
  • Revoke messages (canceling previous agreements)
The handler stores the announcement for admin visibility and optionally updates local state.

    • getCategory

      public final MessageCategory getCategory()
      Description copied from interface: GTNetMessageHandler
      Returns the category of messages this handler processes. Used for validation and to determine expected response behavior.

    • handle

      public final HandlerResult handle(GTNetMessageContext context) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: GTNetMessageHandler
      Handles the incoming message and returns a result indicating the outcome.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context containing request data and utilities
      Returns:
      the handler result indicating response type or error
      Throws:
      Exception - if processing fails unexpectedly

    • validateAnnouncement

      protected ValidationResult validateAnnouncement(GTNetMessageContext context)
      Validates the announcement message. Default implementation always returns valid. Override to add validation if needed.
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      Returns:
      validation result

    • processAnnouncementSideEffects

      protected abstract void processAnnouncementSideEffects(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessage storedMessage)
      Processes announcement-specific side effects. Called after the announcement is stored. Use for operations like:
      • Updating GTNet server state (e.g., mark as maintenance)
      • Scheduling local tasks based on announcement content
      • Revoking previously granted permissions
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      storedMessage - the persisted announcement message
